function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Acceleration of automation and robotization","Impact":"Disruption of labor markets, job displacement, and inequality dynamics","Mitigation":"Investing in education and retraining programs, promoting diversity, and creating new job opportunities","Technologies":"Automation technology, robotics, artificial intelligence","People":"Low-skilled workers, high-skilled workers","Owner":"Government, private sector, educational institutions"},{"Description":"Increase in telework and automation due to COVID-19","Impact":"Negative consequences for low-wage workers and inequality","Mitigation":"Providing support for low-wage workers, promoting fair labor policies, and creating opportunities for economic mobility","Technologies":"Teleworking technology, automation technology","People":"Low-wage workers, business leaders, policymakers","Owner":"Government, private sector, policymakers"}]}
